thread.section_title: TrustedHousesitters Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of TrustedHousesitters | www.trustedhousesitters.com
thread.title: Brenda Kock

author: Brenda Kock
title: Brenda Kock
text: I have put my trust in this site thrice now for providing a safe site to transact an arrangement with house owners. There's a certain dignity that the site projects -- I believe it manages to expect and receive the best out of all parties. The yearly price point for membership reflects the work that goes into maintaining the site and services and is not out of line at all. Top site in their field.
